english.segment1: this one goes out to the kids. back at home in the projects where. tomorrow night will be a brawl. its gonna be injustice for all
english.segment2: its way too early for the police to send us home. the fun has just begun. so mr. johnny and all your rules leave us alone. the boys are on the run
english.segment3: here are my last words. screaming loud but i won't be heard. meet me at the circle k. no one hears a word i say
english.segment4: the party's over but the fun has just begun. the night is good and young. the little red head cop he thinks he runs the show. i guess it's time to go
english.segment5: please don't fall away. you'll end up nowhere. hear the words i say. i know cause i've been there
